overview: Guys certainly work up a sweat, whether it's on the court, the field or in the gym. Justin Case and Adam Russo take a shower after a workout and end up flip fucking. Braxton Smith and Alex Mason return from batting practice and sweat up the sheets as well. I wonder who was catching? Armondo de Armas and Jay Alexander finish several sets of tennis and then head back to their resort to mess around. Sean Duran and Osiris Blade return from a good workout but they are overheated and it only gets hotter as Sean takes Osiris' huge cock outside their tropical resort.
title: After the Workout
